alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 4:19AM PST until January 22 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highways 14 and 138, especially near the foothills.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
